SELECT ac.id, ac.name, ac.tel, ac.nickname, ac.pfp, ac.curr_shop_id, ( select IFNULL(sf.role, -1) from tb_staff sf where sf.shop_id = ac.curr_shop_id and sf.staff_id = ac.id ) as role, sh.shop_nm, sh.shop_addr, sh.provider, IF(ac.curr_shop_id = 0, ( select sf2.approval_st from tb_staff sf2 where sf2.staff_id=ac.id ), ( select sf2.approval_st from tb_staff sf2 where sf2.shop_id=ac.curr_shop_id and sf2.staff_id=ac.id )) as approval_st, ac.corp_nm, ac.br_no FROM tb_account ac LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_shop sh on sh.shop_id=ac.curr_shop_id WHERE id = #{userId}
